object.name: mpesarequest
object.property: <model xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n" xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"> <schema> <field name="account_reference" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>account_reference</title> </field> <field name="referrence" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>referrence</title> </field> <field name="phonenumber" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>phonenumber</title> </field> <field name="payable_amount" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>payable_amount</title> </field> <field name="invoice_amount" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>invoice_amount</title> </field> <field name="merchantrequestid" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>MerchantRequestID</title> </field> <field name="checkoutrequestid" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>CheckoutRequestID</title> </field> <field name="responsecode" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>ResponseCode</title> </field> </schema> </model>
